text: it is a hard time for many of us and is

you know it is kind of a national

was guilty at the beginning you know I
think they're just being very cautious
the worst thing is to give people hope

what the families feel so I think

from China a lot of them that we've

hiding something I suspect there's some

and they think that everyone else is the

for
some evidence to be found where it is
